Name: Stories school
About the game: Meet a very strange school that can not only teach you, but also entertain and scare you! Meet students and also teachers who are 'Glad to see you'. The game is a 2D quest where you will move between locations performing one or another action. Interact with the characters around you by fulfilling their requests. Also in the game there are various mini-games that will dispel the gameplay. Envy yourself new friends, make fun of your enemies, or just have a peaceful lesson! Customize your student by dressing them up in different outfits and head to school on the bus!
